page.title: 04CHURCHES IN STOURBRIDGE
page.content: St.Mary's,Oldswinford Rector D.O.Bell St.Peter's,Pedmore Rev. R.Stockley St.Thomas's,Market Street, Rev Barrett St.Michael and all Angels, Rev Beasley St.James,Wollaston Canon F.Honey St.John the{Evangelist},Rev Dr.Snuggs Our Lady and all Saints Msgr J.Burns New Road{Methodist}Rev J.Mountford Gig Mill Methodist Rev J.Mountford Hanbury Hill Baptist Friends Meeting House,Scotts Road Spiritualist{Church},Union Street Christian Community,Baylie Street Unitarian Church,Rev.Penelope Laws West Street Methodist Rev J. Mountford Evanelical;Norton;Chawn Hill Two groups from the christian{religion ;C of E and U.R.C have a unique church sharing relationship at St. John's. They share both buildings and minister.
